price: 6. Xaasaskooda ama kuwa ay gacmahoo- du midig hantaan mooyee1, laguma eedo taasi;
arabic: إِلَّا عَلَىٰٓ أَزۡوَٰجِهِمۡ أَوۡ مَا مَلَكَتۡ أَيۡمَٰنُهُمۡ فَإِنَّهُمۡ غَيۡرُ مَلُومِينَ
footnotes: 1. Ma aha addoon ama addoonad mid aan lagu soo qafaalan dagaal lala galay gaalada.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: illā ʿalā azwājihim aw mā malakat aymānuhum fa-innahum ghayru malūmīna
